Description

Artefact Assembly is a Brisbane based development studio working on their current project: Lanterns

History

Creation

Artefact Assembly as created as the team realised the commercial potential of its first project, Lanterns

Events

Over time, the team has attended multiple events, showcasing Lanterns, and receiving positive feedback.
